Header.title: Sem Spices and Catering
Header.paragraph: Are you a health enthusiasts, you want to live healthy and make healthier choices? Then sem food and spices is your nunmber 1 plug. Sem Spices are made from a 100% blend of natural herbs and roots, they are free from monosodium Glutamate MSG, preservatives or any form of artificial additives

About.paragraph: Sem spices are made from a 100% natural blend of herbs, roots and spices. They are free from monosodium Glutamate MSG preservatives, or any form of artificial additives They do not only make your food taste better but also help you prevent, manage or cure certain health conditions. Apart from the spice Production we also run an msg free catering classes. It's not enough to have the Spice, you need to know the right proportion per meal. The msg free catering classes are targeted at people with health conditions, we have reversed diabetes and cholesterol issues with our meal plans among other things.

Testimonials.text: "I bought Sem spices (jollof, Bbq, spiced crayfish). Omo!!! that crayfish was among the best. It has pepper and some extra stuff that I can't predict. I am in love."
Testimonials.name: Ella Doe

Testimonials.text: " The color and aroma from the jollof spice is superb. I tried it when I had visitors and it was very good. I equally used the bbq spice to make my egg sauce and trust me the taste was so nice."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Mills

Testimonials.text: "Good afternoon sis, I tried out your seasoned salt today to prepare egg for my family. To my satisfaction, it came out tasty just the way I love it. I used to make it using table salt, msg, white papper and curry powder."
Testimonials.name: John Edollo

Testimonials.text: "Mama, sorry I'm just responding. The soup spice is very good. I used it while preparing egusi soup, made a whole lot of sense. I added the cinnamon and garlic/ginger mix to my boiling water for tea and it's the bomb."
Testimonials.name: Steven Mandy

Testimonials.text: "Hey sis, the spices are giving my soup a different and delicious taste. I love the jollof spice, I used it to make jollof on sunday , it was finger licking. I also love the mixed pepper, I used for ogbono .. Omg the taste was so nice."
Testimonials.name: Fred Estell

Testimonials.text: "Good evening ma'am! I have used and I am still using the seasoning salt. Matter of fact I 've finally stopped using maggi and also introduced it to my mom this last Christmas and she was so impressed."
Testimonials.name: Stan Rose
